weapons.name: Dagger
weapons.effect: Subtle, piercing, slashing, can be thrown

weapons.name: Flail
weapons.effect: Bludgeoning, toppling, cannot be used for parrying

weapons.name: Lance
weapons.effect: Long, piercing, requires combat trained mount

weapons.name: Crossbow, Light
weapons.effect: Piercing, requires quiver, no damage bonus

weapons.name: Crossbow, Heavy
weapons.effect: Piercing, requires quiver, no damage bonus

weapons.name: Crossbow, Hand
weapons.effect: Piercing, requires quiver, no damage bonus

armors.name: Chainmail
armors.effect: Bane on EVADE and SNEAKING rolls.

armors.name: Plate Armor
armors.effect: Bane on ACROBATICS, EVADE, and SNEAKING rolls.

armors.name: Great Helm
armors.effect: Bane on AWARENESS and all ranged attacks.

clothes.name: Fine Garments
clothes.effect: Boon on CHA-based skills when the GM finds it reasonable.

clothes.name: Fur
clothes.effect: Boon on BUSHCRAFT for resisting cold (page 54).

clothes.name: Rags
clothes.effect: Bane on CHA-based skills when the GM finds it reasonable.

clothes.name: Simple Clothes
clothes.effect: Required to avoid a bane on CHA-based skills.

tradeGoods.name: Bagpipe
tradeGoods.effect: Reduces the WP cost of the Musician ability to 1 and increases range to 50 meters.

tradeGoods.name: Drum
tradeGoods.effect: Increases the range of the Musician ability to 20 meters.

tradeGoods.name: Flute
tradeGoods.effect: Reduces the WP cost of the Musician ability to 2.

tradeGoods.name: Harp
tradeGoods.effect: Reduces the WP cost of the Musician ability to 1.

tradeGoods.name: Horn
tradeGoods.effect: Increases the range of the Musician ability to 100 meters.

tradeGoods.name: Lyre
tradeGoods.effect: Reduces the WP cost of the Musician ability to 1.

tradeGoods.name: Amulet
tradeGoods.effect: Can be used as a focus for spells.

tradeGoods.name: Book
tradeGoods.effect: Boon on skill rolls in a specific subject. The cost varies depending on the subject.

tradeGoods.name: Brooch
tradeGoods.effect: Can be used as a focus for spells.

tradeGoods.name: Chalk
tradeGoods.effect: Can be used as a focus for spells.

tradeGoods.name: Grimoire
tradeGoods.effect: The cost varies depending on the content and may be much higher.

tradeGoods.name: Hourglass
tradeGoods.effect: Can be used as a focus for spells.

tradeGoods.name: Notebook
tradeGoods.effect: Empty, can be used as a grimoire.

tradeGoods.name: Orbuculum
tradeGoods.effect: Can be used as a focus for spells.

tradeGoods.name: Paper (sheet)
tradeGoods.effect: Can be used to write down spells.

tradeGoods.name: Parchment (sheet)
tradeGoods.effect: Can be used to write down spells.

tradeGoods.name: Quill & Ink
tradeGoods.effect: Can be used to write down spells.

tradeGoods.name: Reliquary
tradeGoods.effect: Can be used as a focus for spells.

tradeGoods.name: Wand
tradeGoods.effect: Can be used as a focus for spells.

tradeGoods.name: Flint & Tinder
tradeGoods.effect: Required to light torches, candles, or lanterns, and to make a fire.

tradeGoods.name: Lamp Oil
tradeGoods.effect: Holds ten doses. Each dose keeps an oil lamp or lantern burning for up to one shift of time.

tradeGoods.name: Lantern
tradeGoods.effect: Illuminates a 10 meter radius. Burns for up to a shift of time, but roll D8 after each stretch of time. On 1 the lantern goes out and must be refilled and relit (action).

tradeGoods.name: Oil Lamp
tradeGoods.effect: Illuminates a 10 meter radius. Burns for up to a shift of time, but roll D6 after each stretch of time. On 1 the lamp goes out and must be refilled and relit (action).

tradeGoods.name: Tallow Candle
tradeGoods.effect: Illuminates a 4 meter radius. Burns for up to a shift of time, but roll D4 after each stretch of time, or if the bearer attacks or is attacked. On 1 the candle goes out.

tradeGoods.name: Torch
tradeGoods.effect: Illuminates a 10 meter radius. Burns for up to a shift of time, but roll D6 after each stretch of time, or if the torch is used as a weapon. On 1 the torch goes out.

tradeGoods.name: Crowbar
tradeGoods.effect: 2D6 damage against a door or wall, without risk of being damaged. Hits automatically.

tradeGoods.name: Hammer
tradeGoods.effect: 2D4 damage against a door or wall, without risk of being damaged. Hits automatically.

tradeGoods.name: Needle & Thread
tradeGoods.effect: Mends clothes with a CRAFTING roll.

tradeGoods.name: Pickaxe
tradeGoods.effect: 2D8 damage against a door or wall, without risk of being damaged. Hits automatically.

tradeGoods.name: Saw
tradeGoods.effect: Cuts metal or wood in one stretch.

tradeGoods.name: Shovel
tradeGoods.effect: Reduces the time spent digging by half.

tradeGoods.name: Sledgehammer
tradeGoods.effect: 2D10 damage against a door or wall, without risk of being damaged. Hits automatically.

tradeGoods.name: Blacksmithing Tools
tradeGoods.effect: Used for CRAFTING (page 34).

tradeGoods.name: Carpentry Tools
tradeGoods.effect: Used for CRAFTING (page 34).

tradeGoods.name: Tanning Tools
tradeGoods.effect: Used for CRAFTING (page 34).

tradeGoods.name: Backpack
tradeGoods.effect: Increases carrying capacity by 2. A person can only use one backpack at a time.

tradeGoods.name: Barrel
tradeGoods.effect: Holds up to 15 weight units. Can take 10 points of damage, armor rating 3.

tradeGoods.name: Basket
tradeGoods.effect: Holds up to 10 weight units.

tradeGoods.name: Bottle
tradeGoods.effect: Contains 1 unit of liquid.

tradeGoods.name: Bucket
tradeGoods.effect: Contains up to 5 units of liquid.

tradeGoods.name: Chest
tradeGoods.effect: Holds up to 20 weight units. Can take 25 points of damage, armor rating 5.

tradeGoods.name: Clay Jug
tradeGoods.effect: Contains 1 unit of liquid.

tradeGoods.name: Saddle Bag
tradeGoods.effect: Increases an animal's carrying capacity by 2. An animal can carry no more than two saddle bags.

tradeGoods.name: Poison, Lethal (dose)
tradeGoods.effect: See page 52.

tradeGoods.name: Poison, Paralyzing (dose)
tradeGoods.effect: See page 53.

tradeGoods.name: Poison, Sleeping (dose)
tradeGoods.effect: See page 53.

tradeGoods.name: Herbal Concoction (dose)
tradeGoods.effect: Boon on HEALING rolls for resisting disease (page 53).

tradeGoods.name: Healing Potion (dose)
tradeGoods.effect: Instantly heals 2D6 HP. Stronger potions heal more HP, but are more expensive.

tradeGoods.name: Bandages (10)
tradeGoods.effect: Required to avoid a bane on HEALING rolls for saving lives. Each attempt consumes a bandage.

tradeGoods.name: Surgical Instruments
tradeGoods.effect: Boon on HEALING rolls for saving a life.

tradeGoods.name: Bear Trap
tradeGoods.effect: Can be used for hunting (page 103).

tradeGoods.name: Fishing Rod
tradeGoods.effect: Gives D4 rations of food when fishing (page 103).

tradeGoods.name: Fishing Net
tradeGoods.effect: Gives D6 rations of food when fishing (page 103).

tradeGoods.name: Snare
tradeGoods.effect: Can be used for hunting (page 103). Can only be used once.

tradeGoods.name: Canoe
tradeGoods.effect: Can carry two people and 10 weight units.

tradeGoods.name: Cart
tradeGoods.effect: Pulled by one horse or donkey. Can carry two people and 50 weight units.

tradeGoods.name: Rowing Boat
tradeGoods.effect: Can carry four people and 50 weight units.

tradeGoods.name: Sailing Boat
tradeGoods.effect: Can carry six people and 100 weight units.

tradeGoods.name: Wagon
tradeGoods.effect: Pulled by two horses or donkeys. Can carry four people and 100 weight units.

tradeGoods.name: Chicken
tradeGoods.effect: Yields one ration of food when slaughtered. The meat should be cooked (page 103).

tradeGoods.name: Combat Trained Horse
tradeGoods.effect: Can carry one rider and 10 weight units, or two riders.

tradeGoods.name: Cow
tradeGoods.effect: Yields D4 rations of food (milk) per day, and 2D10 rations of food when slaughtered. The meat should be cooked (page 103).

tradeGoods.name: Donkey
tradeGoods.effect: Can carry 10 weight units. Cannot be ridden.

tradeGoods.name: Guard Dog
tradeGoods.effect: Protects its owner. For stats, see page 99.

tradeGoods.name: Homing Pigeon in Cage
tradeGoods.effect: Flies home to its dovecote when released, wherever it is.

tradeGoods.name: Pig
tradeGoods.effect: Yields 2D6 rations of food when slaughtered. The meat should be cooked (page 103).

tradeGoods.name: Riding Horse
tradeGoods.effect: Can carry one rider and 10 weight units, or two riders.

tradeGoods.name: Sheep
tradeGoods.effect: Yields 2D4 rations of food when slaughtered. The meat should be cooked (page 103).

tradeGoods.name: Abacus
tradeGoods.effect: Boon on INT rolls for solving mathematical problems.

tradeGoods.name: Blanket
tradeGoods.effect: Required to avoid a bane on rolls to avoid the effects of cold (page 54).

tradeGoods.name: Chess Set
tradeGoods.effect: Opposed roll for INT determines who wins.

tradeGoods.name: Dice
tradeGoods.effect: Chance determines who wins.

tradeGoods.name: Field Kitchen
tradeGoods.effect: Boon on BUSHCRAFT rolls for cooking (page 103).

tradeGoods.name: Field Ration
tradeGoods.effect: One ration must be consumed per day, otherwise you become hungry (page 54).

tradeGoods.name: Grappling Hook
tradeGoods.effect: Can be used to secure a rope. Can be thrown and secured with an ACROBATICS roll up to STR meters (STR × 2 with a bane).

tradeGoods.name: Lockpicks, Advanced
tradeGoods.effect: Boon on SLEIGHT OF HAND rolls for picking locks.

tradeGoods.name: Lockpicks, Simple
tradeGoods.effect: Required to avoid a bane on SLEIGHT OF HAND rolls for picking locks.

tradeGoods.name: Magnifying Glass
tradeGoods.effect: Boon to SPOT HIDDEN rolls.

tradeGoods.name: Map
tradeGoods.effect: Required to avoid a bane on BUSHCRAFT rolls for leading the way during journeys.

tradeGoods.name: Marbles
tradeGoods.effect: Can be thrown at a humanoid enemy within 10 meters, as an action. Next turn the enemy must make an EVADE roll (not an action) in order to move.

tradeGoods.name: Padlock
tradeGoods.effect: Locks a door or chest. Can take 20 points of damage, armor rating 5.

tradeGoods.name: Perfume (10 doses)
tradeGoods.effect: Boon on CHA-based skill rolls when the GM finds it reasonable.

tradeGoods.name: Playing Cards
tradeGoods.effect: Opposed roll for BLUFFING determines who wins.

tradeGoods.name: Quiver of Arrows, Iron Head
tradeGoods.effect: Required to fire bows or crossbows.

tradeGoods.name: Quiver of Arrows, Wooden Head
tradeGoods.effect: Required to fire bows or crossbows. The effectiveness of armor is doubled.

tradeGoods.name: Rope, Hemp (10 meters)
tradeGoods.effect: Boon on ACROBATICS rolls for climbing, but the rope must be secured to something.

tradeGoods.name: Rope, Silk (10 meters)
tradeGoods.effect: Boon on ACROBATICS rolls for climbing, but the rope must be secured to something.

tradeGoods.name: Saddle
tradeGoods.effect: Required to avoid a bane when fighting from horseback.

tradeGoods.name: Sleeping Fur
tradeGoods.effect: Required to avoid a bane on BUSHCRAFT rolls for making camp.

tradeGoods.name: Spyglass
tradeGoods.effect: Boon on BUSHCRAFT rolls for leading the way during journeys.

tradeGoods.name: Tent, Small
tradeGoods.effect: Can accommodate up to two people. Grants a boon on BUSHCRAFT rolls for making camp. Only one person rolls, but others can help.

tradeGoods.name: Tent, Large
tradeGoods.effect: Can accommodate up to six people. Grants a boon on BUSHCRAFT rolls for making camp. Only one person rolls, but others can help.

tradeGoods.name: Whistle
tradeGoods.effect: Can be heard from up to 100 meters away.
